title: friends history request
body: how do i know how much time i am friends with someone on league or the date that i added him/her from{{champion:32}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: This isn't information that's readily available.  A lot of info like this isn't shared, and our account team may use it as a question to help in cases like account recovery.  In this case, trust your heart on it.  :D
